page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content:
Our survey area is very close to the market town of Retford,and consists mostly of grassland,farms and small villages.
There is very little industry,and many workers are employed in agriculture or work out of our survey area.
The main centres of population are Clarborough,Welham and Little Gringley.
The area is crossed by the busy A 620 road,which serves the nearby Power Stations of the Trent Valley.There is also a main line railway and part of the Chesterfield Canal in the survey area.
